Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsMy two daughters came in from the store and said dad come look at this it was 9:10.I saw two unidentified objects with multi colored lights flickering like the flame on a candle. The first was about three miles to the south of I30,The second was about six miles to the west.Both objects hovered for at least five min. The object to the south moved very slowly toward the interstate and started heading east for about three miles then turned north and shot straight up out of sight.The object to the west continued to hover and then vanished from eyesight.These objects had no sound what so ever and had every color of the rainbow flickering on them.
Summary: Two objects hovering multi colored flickering lights both had one bright light.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sulphur Springs
There was one other sighting in Sulphur Springs on or around January 29th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
